name: seedbase
description: Seedbase is a tool for local farmers, small businesses, and garden enthusiasts for efficient and smart planting. Our seed database is a sophisticatedly organized compilation of passionate local businesses and farms that offers a wide variety of seeds for flowers, vegetables, fruit, and more. Seedbase offers multiple search options and filters allowing you find the best product based on your needs.
author: Pranav Maniktala & Aldi Maraya
